before

before(): inTheControlFlowOfDynamicCallToMethod()..

AdviceType: Before

Scope: Accesses to non private methods annotated with @InstancePrivate through dynamic method invocation.

Name: instanceMethodsDynamicInvocationAccessEnforcer

This advice verifies if the annotated private methods dynamically invoked are accessed by a different instance. @throws IllegalAccess if the method is accessed by other instances.

before(): executionOfNonStaticInstancePrivateAnnotatedMethod..

AdviceType: Before

Scope: Executions of methods annotated with @InstancePrivate.

Name: instanceMethodsDynamicInvocationAccessEnforcer

This advice verifies the signatures of the executed methods checking if they override a superclass method and strengthen its precondition. @throws InvalidMethodDefinition if the accessor class has restricted access.
